nodes.bodyText: should password_reset be remove from use status? it doesn't sound like an status to me, should be a flag instead.

After login success, am sending the user status to mobile apps or participant manager, based on status they show change password or landing page. I'm setting status to PASSORD_RESET when password changed using forgot password. I agree we could have added a column for flag but I used status for this from the beginning. Thanks for approving the PR.
